answers.answer: Hi,Shortness of breath, numb toes and pain in left centre of back are not signs of menopause. Hence a thorough evaluation with your Doctor is necessary to rule out cardiac problems, hypertension, diabetes etc. Hope this helps.Take care and good luck.

question: 44 yo female and menopause onset runs early in my family.  Been having hot flashes, so assume that's what I'm going through, but yesterday at boot camp got shortness of breath and an numb toes.  This morning felt fatigue upon waking up and upon doing chores got shortness of breath, numb toes and pain in left center of back.
title: Are these symptoms related to Menopause or should I be worried about something else?
